## Intent.langCode property

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> This is no longer in use (it was in fact, never used). Favor [Intent.defaultLocale](./stentor-models.intent.defaultlocale.md) and [Intent.locales](./stentor-models.intent.locales.md) instead.

